title: If a sixth grader had one F in the sixth grade, will they fail? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on the requirements for the school, and how important the class was in advancing. Normally, an"F" isn't a good sign, but if the class isn't required, and your grades are otherwise good, then you'll be OK. Talk to your school counselor for questions about your grades.
no. You might just have to repeat that class or be in a help class depending on what subject in is in.
